author: sfgate.com
title: Halloween events
text:
Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein Doors at 7 p.m.; Movie at 8 p.m. Fri. $5. Paramount Theater, 2025 Broadway, Oakland. (800) 745 3000. www.ticketmaster.com .
After Dark: Cinema Arts “Raising Spirits.” Accordionist Rob Reich plays along with classic animations at the Exploratorium’s weekly adults-only, after-hours event. 8 p.m. program. 6-10 p.m. Thurs. $10-$15. The Exploratorium, Pier 15, S.F. (415) 528-4444. www.exploratorium.edu. 
Alice in Foreverland: Thriller Halloween Ball Music of Michael Jackson. 8 p.m. Fri. $22. Bimbo’s 365 Club, 1025 Columbus Ave., S.F. (415) 474-0365. www.bimbos365club.com 
14th Annual Halloween Massive Production: The Ghosts of San Francisco 9 p.m. Sat-2 a.m. next Sun. $25-$100. Hotel Whitcomb, 1231 Market St., S.F. (415) 478-8558. www.halloweenmassive.com 
14th Annual Halloween Murder Ballads Bash 8:30 p.m. Sat. $8-$15. Starry Plough Pub, 3101 Shattuck Ave, Berkeley. (510) 841-0188. www.thestarryplough.com .
21st Annual Freaker’s Ball Costume contest, music. 9 p.m. Sat.-6 a.m. next Sun. $20-$30. The Sound Factory, 525 Harrison St., S.F. www.raindancepresents.com 
Back in Time 80s Halloween Bash with SuperHuey 8 p.m.-midnight Sat. $18-$20. Fenix Club, 919 Fourth St., San Rafael. (415) 813-5600. www.fenixlive.com .
BATS Improv Halloween Horror Musical 8-10 p.m. Fri.-Sat. $17-$20. Bayfront Theater, B350 Ft. Mason Center, S.F. (415) 474-6776. www.improv.org 
Bay Area Science Festival Halloween Bash Halloween and makers mashup with community made arcade games, pumpkin patch, trick-or-treating, large scale Rube Goldberg style candy delivery system triggered by a can of food for the food drive, wizard themed experience with light up magic wands. Noon-4 p.m. Sat. Free. Bon Air Center, 50 Bon Air Center, Greenbrae. (415) 461-0200. www.bonair.com .
Bay Street Boo Bash Kids and doggie costume parades, face painting, activities. 11 a.m.-2 p.m. Sat. Free. Bay Street, 5616 Bay St., Emeryville. (510) 655-4002. www.baystreetemeryville.com 
Beautiful Creatures Halloween Ball 2015 9 p.m. Sat.-2 a.m. next Sun. $20-$400. Monroe, 473 Broadway St., S.F. (510) 472-2029. www.monroesf.com 
Blind Scream Haunted House With three different scary areas. 7-10 p.m. today, Tues.-Thurs.; 7-11 p.m. Fri.-Sat. $10-$30. Sonoma Mountain Village, 1500 Valley House Drive, Rohnert Park. www.blindscream.com .
Boo! Bark, Brews and Bites Dress your doggies for a canine costume contest, dabble in paw painting, pet pampering and psychic, puppy photo booth, more. 11 a.m.-4 p.m. Sat. Jack London Square, Oakland. (510) 645-9292. www.jacklondonsquare.com 
Boograss: Hillbilly Halloween With Front Country, One Grass Two Grass, Rusty Stringfield. 9 p.m. Sat. $15. Slim’s, 333 11th St., S.F. www.slimspresents.com .
Boo! San Francisco 2015 With Flosstradamus, Oliver Heldens, Shaun Frank, Dr. Fresch, Ghastly, The Magician, Nicky Romero, Snails, Dallask, Kennedy Jones, Seven Lions, Will Sparks. 5 p.m.-1 a.m. Fri. and Sat. $59.50. Bill Graham Civic Auditorium, 99 Grove St., S.F. www.ticketmaster.com 
Celebration of Mind: Halloween Edition Celebrate math with hands-on activities, live entertainment, “Dress as Your Favorite Lewis Carroll Character” costume contest, more. 11 a.m.-3 p.m. Sat. Free. Mathematical Sciences Research Institute, 17 Gauss Way, Berkeley. (510) 642-0143. www.msri.org .
Cosmic Arcade Night: Blacklight Halloween Blacklight-friendly costumes encouraged. Costume contest at 11 p.m. on Sat. 8 p.m. Fri.-Sat. Brewcade, 2200 B Market St., S.F. www.brewcadesf.com. 
Country Blues Halloween Dance Party With Howell Devine and the Tip Top Trio 8 p.m. Sat. $10-$15. Ashkenaz, 1317 San Pablo Ave., Berkeley. www.ashkenaz.com 
Creatures of the Nightlife Costume party event with Peaches Christ, drag performance; DJ Omar; Northern California Haunters Group, haunted house. 6-10 p.m. Thurs. $10-$12. California Academy of Sciences, 55 Music Concourse Dr. (415) 379-8000. www.calacademy.org. 
Day of the Dead Celebration Create sugar skulls, mini-altars and more in honor of Dia de los Muertos. 10 a.m.- 4 p.m. next Sun. Included with museum admission. Children’s Creativity Museum Theater, 221 Fourth St., S.F. (510) 296-4433. www.bactheatre.org. 
Phantasm: A Karnival of Mischief 9 p.m. Sat.-4 a.m. next Sun. $30-$160. The Armory, 1800 Mission St., S.F. www.phantasmsf.com 
Fairfax Annual Halloween Parade and Celebration 5-7 p.m. Sat. Free. Downtown Fairfax. (415) 637-1978. fairfaxchamberca.com/2015-events.
Family Halloween Day With live entertainment, craft activities, face painting, cafe, spooky spaces. 10 a.m.-2 p.m. Sat. Free, $3 donation appreciated. Randall Museum at Mission Art Center, 745 Treat Ave., S.F. (415) 554-9600. www.randall museum.org .
Family Halloween Magic Show With four magicians including Robert Strong. 2 p.m. Sat. $10, under 2 free. Brava Theater, 2781 24th St., S.F. (510) 236 -7469. www.thebuddyclub.com .
Ghost Ship VIII: Annihilation Costume party, large scale immersive art installation, art cars, multiple DJs, drinks. 9 p.m.-4 a.m. Fri.-Sat. $45-$60. Pier 70, Bldg. 12, 420 22nd St., S.F. www.ghostshiphalloween.com 
Halloween: Jacob Fred Jazz Odyssey, Skerik “The Battle For Earth” with Chris Noonan 9 p.m. Sat. $20. Doc’s Lab, 124 Columbus Ave., S.F. (415) 649-6191. www.docslabsf.com 
Halloween Night at Grace Cathedral: Phantom of the Opera Silent film screening. With Dorothy Papadakos, organ. 7 and 9:30 p.m. Sat. $20-$35. Grace Cathedral, 1100 California St., S.F. (866) 920-5299. www.sfjazz.org 
Halloween Sausalito Multiple downtown events include kid friendly and scary haunted houses, Halloween costume parade and town trick or treat, Howl’oween dog costume contest, firefighter barbecue. 4-7 p.m. Sat. Free. Downtown Sausalito. (415) 289-4152. www.ci.sausalito.ca.us .
Haunted Island 2015 Six stages, costume party, more. 8 p.m. Sat.-2 a.m. next Sun. $30. Treasure Island Event Center, 401 California Ave., Treasure Island, S.F. www. cloud10nightlife.com
Heartbreak Halloween With Sage The Gemini, Kehlani, IAMSU, Skizzy Mars, P-Lo, Kool John, Jay Ant, Skipper, others. 8 p.m. Fri. $$30-$50. The Warfield, 982 Market St., S.F. www.thewarfieldtheatre.com 
House of Screams Haunted house for ages 5-15. 6-9 p.m. Sat. Free. MLK Jr. Youth Center, 1730 Oregon St., Berkeley. (510) 981-6671. www.city ofberkeley.info .
Kenn Adams’ Adventure Theater Episode IV: The Haunted House Adventure 3 p.m. Wed. Free. Pittsburg Library, 80 Power Ave., Pittsburg. (925) 427-8390. www.ccclib.org .
Kid Cool Theremin School with Dorit Chrysler Workshop 5 p.m.; performance 6:30 p.m. Fri. Free. Amoeba Music, 1855 Haight St., S.F. (415) 831-1200. www.amoeba.com 
Halloween Festival and Pup Costume Parade With giant pumpkins, face painting, crafts, live music and kids’ entertainment. 9 a.m.-2 p.m. Sat. Free. Marin Country Mart, 2257 Larkspur Landing Circle, Larkspur. (415) 461-5700. www.marincountrymart.com .
Halloween Goes Hollywood: 9th Annual Costume Affair 9 p.m. Sat.-1 a.m.next Sun. $30-$60. Julia Morgan Ballroom, Merchant Exchange Bldg., 465 California St., S.F. www.415halloween.com .
Halloween Hoopla at the Gardens Interactive performances and games for kids under 10 and their adults. Noon-1:30 p.m. Sat. Free. Yerba Buena Gardens, Children’s Garden, 799 Howard St., S.F. (415)543-1718. www. ybgfestival.org .
Halloween Midnight Circus Costume party, performances. 8:30 p.m.Sat.-2 a.m. next Sun. $45-$85. The Village, 969 Market St., S.F. www.hallow een.wework.com/sf
Halloween with the S.F. Symphony “The Rocky Horror Picture Show Turns 40!” Symphony Halloween music performance followed by film screening. Hosted by Peaches Christ. 7:30 p.m. Sat. $15-$65. Davies Symphony Hall, Van Ness Ave., S.F. (415) 864-6000. www.sfsymphony.org .
Haunted Carnival at Pier 33 9 p.m.Sat.-2 a.m. next Sun. $10-$20. Butterfly Restaurant, Pier 33 at Bay St., S.F. www.tick etzonesf.com/hauntedsf
Mayhem Mansion A haunted house tour of the Haas-Lilienthal House. Tours run 7-10 p.m. Today, Fri. and Sat. $10-$20. 2007 Franklin St., S.F. www.eventbrite.com/e/mayhem-mansion-2015-tickets-18062964814 .
Mega Halloween International Ball Costume contest, four rooms, samba dance and drumming. 9 p.m. Sat.-2 a.m. next Sun. $55-$75. Westin St. Francis Hotel, 335 Powell St., S.F. (415) 260-9920. www.aykutevents.com .
Monsters Bash Costume contest, no-host bar, live music with Cocktail Monkeys, haunted house, free parking. 7:30 p.m. Sat-1 a.m. next Sun. $30-$70. USS Hornet Museum, 707 W. Hornet Ave., Alameda. www.uss-hornet.org 
Monster Mash All ages costume dance party with DJ Goodtime and Mark Power. 6-8 p.m. Thurs. Free. Marin Civic Center Library, 501 Civic Center Drive No. 427, San Rafael. (415) 473-6058. www.marinlibrary.org .
New Riders of the Purple Sage Halloween Bash Doors 8 p.m.; show 9 p.m. Fri.-Sat. $35-$42. Sweetwater Music Hall, 19 Corte Madera Ave., Mill Valley. (415) 388-1100. www.swmh.com .
NightMare Island Halloween Haunt With Doctor Burgundy’s Electrostatic Medicine Show, creepy cemetery picnic area, displays, live performances. 5-9 p.m. Thurs.-next Sun. 167 O’Hara Court at Railroad Ave., Mare Island, Vallejo. (707) 563-5593. www.mareislandpreserve.org .
A Nightmare on Van Ness 9 p.m.-2 a.m. Sat. $50-$110. The Regency Center, 1300 Van Ness Ave., S.F. www.nightmareonvanness.com 
NYC ’77: A CBGB vs. Studio 54 Dance Party With North American Scum, DJ sets by Beauregard Testarossa and DJ der Nutzeffekt, Berlin-style pingpong, costume contest. 8 p.m. Fri. $10-$12. Rickshaw Stop, 155 Fell St., S.F. (415) 861-2011. www.rickshawstop.com 
The Offical Houdini Seance 2015 Live magic, escape artists, seance, supernatural discussion. 8-10 p.m. Sat. $39-$69. Brava Theater, 2751 24th St., S.F. (415) 641-7657. www.theofficialhoud iniseance.com .
Pirates in the House Halloween Party and Feast Pirate costume party with treasure hunt, food and drinks, activities. Noon and 3 p.m. Sat. $19-$20. Falkirk Cultural Center, 1408 Mission Ave., San Rafael. (800) 485-3328. www.falkirkculturalcenter.org .
The Rocky Horror Show Live stage production of the film classic. 8 p.m. Wed.-Fri.; 7 and 11 p.m. Sat. $25-$36. Through Nov. 7. Victoria Theatre, 2961 16th St., S.F. www.rayoflighttheatre.com .
Saints and Sinners Halloween Costume Party 9 p.m. Sat.-2 a.m. next Sun. $20-$60. Scottish Rite Center, 1547 Lakeside Dr., Oakland. (415) 573-0740. www.sfhalloween.com/event.aspx?e=36186 
San Anselmo Goblins’ Spooktacular Town sponsored costume party/trick or treat for ages 0-7. 5 p.m. Wed. Free. San Anselmo Ave., San Anselmo. (415) 454-2510. www.sananselmochamber.org .
Scream on the Green Faire “Chamber of Horrors” haunted house, costume contest, live music and entertainment. 10 a.m.-4 p.m. today. Free admission. Sherman Avenue and the Civic Green complex., downtown Novato. (415) 897-1164. business.novatochamber.com.
So Fresh! Halloween 80s-90s old school hip hop Halloween costume party. 9 p.m. Fri. $10-$20. Slate, 2925 16th St., S.F. (415) 558-8521. www.slate-sf.com 
Tam Valley Haunted House “Nightmares: Face Your Fears.” 3:30-4:30 for ages 8 and under; 5-6:30 p.m. for ages 9 and older; 7:30-9:30 p.m. Sat. $5. Community Center, 203 Marin Ave., Mill Valley. (415) 388-6393. www.tcsd.us .
Titanic Masquerade Halloween Party Cruise Costume party, spooky effetcs, snacks, drinks. 7:30 p.m. Sat-1 a.m.next Sun. $125-$150. Fume Blanc Commodore 8, The Embarcadero, Pier 40, S.F. (415) 573-0740.
USF Dance Generators: Halloween Thriller 12:30 and 2:30 p.m. Sat. Included with admission. California Academy of Sciences, 55 Music Concourse Drive, S.F. (415) 379-5411. www.calacademy.org
